Html:
hi radiomen, I love your work please keep it up

this is probably an irritating Q, but i have to ask, hope i get answer.

it is about the secondary cache i would like to use mssql

uncommentated the code on main form,
changed GMap.NET.CacheProviders.MySQLPureImageCache
to
GMap.NET.CacheProviders.MsSQLPureImageCache


i know i am missing something, i am getting the following error when debuging

Cannot fetch the value of field 'cmdFetch' because information about the containing class is unavailable.

but it does not throw error when run but it does not save in the db either

thx , once again i love the work !

Hm, last time i've tested it, it worked.

Make sure sql user has read/write permissions, and for first time it has to have permissions to create the table.

Delete the table, adjust permissions and try again. Or else try debug and catch sql query, execute manualy, etc.

thx men, was not expecting your replay so fast,

i am sure it does work everything else is working, i am missing something small.

will use your advice thanks and have a wonderful new year , and much more success to you men!
